channel.title: What TV shows are you following?
channel.description: I just realized I forgot to remake this thread! So I'm currently watching Nip/Tuck Season 3 and Wildboyz (all seasons). I'm also following Chuck, Reaper and Mythbusters. And I'm thinking of giving a watch to Battlestar Gallactica and Doctor Who, should I?

item.description:

looking forward to “Game of thrones” (pilot to be filmed in October 09)

item.title: What TV shows are you following?
item.dc:creator: MasterHyperActive
item.description:
currently shows but they are getting to their season/series finale:
Prison Break: tmorrow(friday) 2 hrs SERIES Finale 8pm (missed all this season but yet hope to watch series finale,how it all ended)
24: Mon- 2 hrs season finale next week (8pm)
NCIS:Tues- season finale next week (8pm)

House season finale on Mon night was amazing thou missed all their ep, i only watch when i can.

Lost season finale (1hr recap/summary, 2 hrs season finale) on last night was mindblowing, my brain went kaboom and i saw white light…

there are others but don’t have the channels or time for them

Read full topic

item.title: What TV shows are you following?
item.dc:creator: Solex
item.description:
I’ve just been watching a few things here and there when I can.

Fringe - Dr. Walter Bishop is quite an interesting character, and the Observer reminds me of the G-Man. As well as House, Mythbusters and NCIS.

item.title: What TV shows are you following?
item.dc:creator: Trilby
item.description:
Fringe. The acting has gotten much better.
It’s funny how people on Hulu were all like “this show is not going to make it past first season” and “xfiles ripoff lol” but now they insult the intelligence of anyone who challenges the show.
Well that was fast

Edit: I really like it, btw. Just making this clear
